original_text: These are the statutes and judgments, which ye shall observe to do in the land, which the Lord God of thy fathers giveth thee to possess it, all the days that ye live upon the earth.
korean_text: 네 조상의 하나님 여호와께서 네게 주셔서 차지하게 하신 땅에서 너희가 평생에 지켜 행할 규례와 법도는 이러하니라

sentences.original_text: These are the statutes and judgments
which ye shall observe to do
which the Lord God of thy fathers giveth thee
sentences.korean_translation: 네 조상들의 주 하나님이 네게 주시는

sentences.original_text: all the days that ye live upon the earth
sentences.korean_translation: 네가 땅에 사는 모든 날 동안이니라
